sentences.sContent: He trekked across some of the most inhospitable terrain in the world.
sentences.sCn: 他长途跋涉，穿越了世界上一些最荒凉的地带。

synos.tran: 荒凉的；冷淡的，不好客的；不适居留的

trans.tranCn: 不好客的,不适于居住的
trans.tranOther: an inhospitable place is difficult to live or stay in because the weather conditions are unpleasant or there is no shelter
